metadata.title: Primary Productivity in Offshore Areas

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Environmental Satellite, Data
Information Service (NESDIS), National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC)

metadata.description: Measurements of primary productivity.   In addition to cruise information, position, date, time, sampling depth and environmental information, this file may contain measured parameters of nutrients, chlorophyll a and carbon assimilation.  Also included are data from the Outer Continental Shelf Environmental Assessment Program.  On-line documentation is available on the NOSIE system located on the NODC VAX computer and the NODC User's guide.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The data are collected to provide information on nutrient levels and nutrient flow in offshore areas.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
